name: w5-speed shopping
description:
Play: WASD to control direction, SPACE for jumping, MOUSE LEFT CLICK for grabbing.

Rule: Find target grocery, and pick up to drop at the cart near the cashier within time constrain.

Goal: Try to pass the level before the time runs out. 

In this game, Rebecca, Yii, and I created a virtual shopping experience where players can shop around with time limitations. In-game, players need to locate the target grocery in the market and checkout at the cashier by dropping it at the cart. The overall gaming experience aims to become more and more difficult. Hope you will enjoy the game and finding those target groceries.
